title: Preparing for the Holiday Mailing Season
description:
It’s the most wonderful time of the year! In this week’s episode, Isaac Cronkhite (USPS Chief Logistics and Processing Operations Officer) and Josh Colin (USPS Chief Retail and Delivery Operations Officer) chat with our hosts, Yasmine and Dale, to take listeners behind-the-scenes of USPS holiday preparations.

Listen in as we learn more about what a typical holiday season looks like for USPS, the unique challenges of the 2020 holiday season, and the adjustments the Postal Service has made to ensure smooth holiday deliveries this season.
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
content:encoded:

itunes:title: Preparing for the Holiday Mailing Season
itunes:author: United States Postal Service
itunes:summary: This week, we are speaking with USPS EVPs Isaac Cronkhite and Josh Colin about prepping the Postal Service network for the holiday season. We’ll talk about learnings from the 2020 holiday delivery season, as well as improvements we’ve made to ensure smooth holiday deliveries this year.

We’ll talk about learnings from the 2020 holiday delivery season, as well as improvements we’ve made to ensure smooth holiday deliveries this year.
itunes:keywords: shipping, packages, peak, mailing, usps, holiday
